subject: VAM Pro Help
description_text:
I just got the 2 pack of the VAM Pro's. Installed on throttle and brake.
The software sees them but they do nothing. SimHub is the same way. I have
tried different usb ports, cables, power outlets. Everything looks perfect
but i have nothing. Ive had the pedals for a year now and they work
perfect. Any help?

conversations.body_text: Hi Gerry Turner,  Launch the latest version of SIMSONN Manager 2.1.2. On the “Plus X” control unit, press and hold the “Upgrade” button. While holding the button, unplug the USB cable from the PC and then plug it back in. The software should detect the device entering “SIMSONN Flasher update mode”. In the software go to: Settings → Update → Manual Firmware Update. In the file selector choose: pedals‑firmware → pedals‑plusx.sfu. Click “Start Update” and wait until the firmware is completely written. During this process do not disconnect the USB or close the application. Once the update is finished (you’ll get a success prompt or the unit will reboot), unplug and re‑plug the USB then test the pedal device to confirm everything works correctly.

I have tried this 4 times now and I am getting the same results. Simsonn
software and simhub show them but when I click test or vibrate, I get
nothing

On Sat, Dec 27, 2025 at 10:21 PM support@simsonn.com

Hi Gerry Turner,     After a successful update, the CPU2 version should be 2.0.4. Based on the current situation, the update process may not have completed correctly. Please try performing the update again. If the progress bar cannot complete normally from 0% to 100%, it is likely that the mainboard is faulty.

no matter how many times I flash it, nothing changes. I tried installing
the plusx-old.sfu and i get CPU2 to v2.0.0 (see picture). as soon as i
upgrade to 2.0.5 the cpu2 goes to not connected. Anything else i can try?
Again, my pedals work 100% perfect, its only the Vam pro's not working.
Thank you!

On Tue, Dec 30, 2025 at 8:34 PM support@simsonn.com

Hi Gerry Turner,  Please install ToDesk so I can assist you with a remote update and testing now. If the issue still cannot be resolved, we can arrange to send you a new control box. Kindly provide your ToDesk ID and temporary access code.

here is the todesk info. When i booted up my computer, the CPU2 version is
gone? last night it had the image that i sent you

Hi Gerry Turner,  I can assist you remotely today.

Tell me what you need from me?

Since our last email, the CPU2 is showing nothing again. I did not flash
it. It somehow deleted itself
